title: Lynda - Corporate and Documentary Video Lighting With Eduardo An
description:
Lynda - Corporate and Documentary Video Lighting With Eduardo Angel 

Subject:  Video 

28m 56s Appropriate for all Mar 06, 2015 | Uploaded in Mar 14, 2015 by 2boweb



In corporate and documentary films, the subjects are actual people, places, and things. Filmmakers have very limited flexibility when it comes to choosing or enhancing them. Compelling lighting, however, can help resolve challenges with the subjects, locations, the time of day, and even the weather, and contribute to the mood of the final footage. This course follows production veteran and instructor Eduardo Angel as he shows how to light and shoot four real-world environments: an outdoor documentary scene, a conference-room interview, an interior/exterior architectural backdrop, and an active business where customers are coming and going.Ã¢â‚¬Â¨Ã¢â‚¬Â¨Each chapter begins with a strategy session, and includes tips for capitalizing on natural light, repositioning the camera, and getting the final shot. Eduardo closes the course with a wrap-up of the shoots and some final thoughts on shooting video for corporate clients.
Topics include:

	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Choosing your location wisely
	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Working with natural light
	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Picking a camera position
	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Lighting the scene
